subject: Sales
title: Voice Commerce and Smart Speakers
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Voice Commerce and Smart Speakers.

hook.text: 'Alexa, order more coffee.' Millions of Americans now buy products by talking to a speaker.

buildup.text: Voice commerce removes the last step: you don't even need a screen to make a purchase.

discovery.text: Brands optimizing for voice search found that being the first result matters more than ever.

twist.text: Voice limits choice drastically. When the speaker picks the brand, every other seller becomes invisible.

climax.text: Voice commerce rewards simplicity and brand loyalty. In a screenless world, familiarity wins.

punchline.text: In voice commerce, the first brand named wins.

quiz.question: Why is voice commerce challenging for lesser-known brands?
options: Voice results typically feature only one brand, making others invisible
